title: bullshit
body:
WHY THE FUCK CHAMPIONS SUCH AS GAREN AND DARIUS ARE ALLOWED TO DO DISGUSTING AMOUNT OF DMG WITH  ONE ITEM , LITERALLY JUST BC AND FULL ARMOR/HP/MR  AT THE SAME TIME ASSASSINS LIKE KATARINA AKALI ZED CANT DO A SHIT BECAUSE  BECAUSE THEY DO ZERO DMG TO TANKS AND BRUSIERS  XDD LIKE WTF IS WRONG WITH YOU GUYS ? XDDDDDDD 

IN THIS CASE JUST MAKE ASSASSINS AND MAGES TANKY WITHOUT TANK ITEMS LOLOL

replies.body: Why is it always EUNE players that make these kinda of posts.

> [{quoted}](name=rawiazam1,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=39Bbg0Uf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-12-28T18:39:44.923+0000)
>
> please don't generalise

Are we experiencing the birth of serverism?

me ?? I think everyone hate brusiers exept you and people like hashinshin who play only one champion over 5k games in 1 season
Have you tried not standing still.

they have super low mobility and they cant really stick on people that hard and they don't have great engage either 

u kind of just counter most of them by running away or kiting them
